edgerouter.desc: When drop-in gateway is working, all traffic from clients in the network is first processed by this router. You can use this mode to extend the functionality of your primary route.
edgerouter.dhcp_closed_tips: The DHCP service on the main router is disabled, drop-in gateway is working.
edgerouter.dhcp_on_tips: The DHCP service is still enabled on the main router. Drop-in gateway may not work properly. Please go to $$$$the main router admin panel$$$$ to disable the DHCP service or set its gateway to {ip}.
edgerouter.enable_tips: When the drop-in gateway is working, the DNS of this router is used instead of the DNS of the main route.
edgerouter.dhcp_set_gateway_tips: The DHCP service on the main router has correctly set the gateway to {ip}, drop-in gateway is working.
edgerouter.auto_set_tips: The DHCP settings of the parent router are detected to have changed and the router may not be able to network properly. Please $$$$Sync the Settings from DHCP$$$$ or modify your settings manually.
edgerouter.desc_vpn: Please note that the VPN policy of this device does not work for clients from the WAN port in drop-in gateway mode.
edgerouter.cable_not_connected_tips: No cable detected in WAN port. Please insert an ethernet cable.
